Articles.Content:
lock nao plz

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-15T01:05:34Z" title="08/15/2015 01:05  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 15, 2015</time> by \_Augustus\_**
When can we expect this roughly?

> 
> When can we expect this roughly?

I don't know. Thomas said he should be finished around this time, but I guess he's at school now.

> 
> I have week-end. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> Tekno just needs to look at one Kopernicus fix and he has to make the pre-release, then I will open the thread for it. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) But I think he's sleeping at the moment. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) So, expect a release in the evening (UTC+1 / German time).

Can we just use this thread? I'm on my PC for at least 4 hours a day, I'll be able to add in what you post.

So you mean like 5:00 your time? That's lunchtime for me, and in like 3 hours.

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Are any of them habitable?

I need to know which moons and boring planets to delete... Sorry... But I keep gas giants....

> 
> Are any of them habitable?
> I need to know which moons and boring planets to delete... Sorry... But I keep gas giants....

Etaria is, and Sothebin has microbes.

Unfortunately I'll only be adding gas giants until PQS works in standalone Kopernicus.

> 
> Yes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) And I'm going to start my own thread.

So excited!

- - - Updated - - -

Just a few hours then?
